resources.string: There are no saved notes. You either did not create any or have not yet synched with your ownCloud.
Please check your username and password.

This app is brought to you by aykit - an association supporting art, culture and science. 
More information on our website: 

http://aykit.org

All revenue will be spent to improve this app and do other great things to support internet freedom. If you have any suggestions or want to build this application yourself, visit us at https://github.com/aykit/myownnotes-android.
We need your permission to access your Owncloud account
You need to grant this permission to use this app
We use the accounts of the ownCloud or Nextcloud app. After adding the account there you will see it in this app.
No accounts found. Please add an account using a cloud app.
